sentences.sContent: Two men have been arrested and questioned.
sentences.sCn: 已有两名男子被捕并受到盘问。

sentences.sContent: Joseph questioned the doctors closely (= asked them a lot of questions ).
sentences.sCn: 约瑟夫问了医生很多问题。

sentences.sContent: ...raising the question of the value of pursuing a broad scale outsourcing initiative...
...and teach children to question authority figures and navigate elite institutions...
...what question does the example in the movie raise...
...if a student meets a difficult question about their major...
...each passage is followed by some question or unfinished statements for each of them there are four choices marked a...
...A recent International Labor Organization report says the deterioration of real wages around the world calls into question the true extent of an economic recovery...
...What question is frequently put to the speaker...
...The question will confront New Yorkers in February as the city's first robotic parking opens in Chinatown...
...Yet the persistent question of Why do I need that...
...you've probably pondered the question a psychologist...

phrases.pCn: 讨论中的；成问题的；考虑中的
回答这个问题；（马在赛马前测试时）跑得很好
不可能；不知底细；根本谈不上
待决的问题；容易讨论的问题
好问题；不易回答的问题
adv. 毫无疑问；无可争辩
安全问题；找回密码问题；安全提问
反问；设问；修辞性疑问句
要求投票决定；提付表决

words.tran: 可疑地，不清楚地；不可靠地

trans.tranOther: to ask someone questions in order to get information about something such as a crime
